title: client freezing
body: as of late, my client occasionally freezes during champ select. It just stays frozen until i reopen league resulting in a dodge

replies.body:
Most of the time these freezes in champ select are a direct result of your client dropping its connection to the matchmaking servers. Local network configurations are the most common cause, so I suggest checking out [our guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to resolving this.

Let me know if your problem persists.
